values.description: Cover vulnerabilities exploit (0day, 1day, nday), exploit kit
Deep-Dark Web forum, marketplace, hosting, etc
Legitimate SW or HW repurposed for malicious use
Does not belong to any of the other category
Specific attack patterns (specific to a technology, to an author, not widely used, etc)
Non-technical description of threat actor activities (information war, destruction, hybrid, etc)
Asset being targeted (MacOS, Android, ICS, IoT, Cryptocurrency, ect)

description: ttp category vocab as defined by Cert EU.
